about_the_game:
Tower Defense in the Dark - Illuminate Enemies to Defeat Them

Defend against dark forces created by an experiment gone catastrophically wrong. Mysterious enemies are determined to extinguish all light across the universe. You must thwart their efforts and maintain control of intergalactic outposts. Use illumination from towers with unique capabilities to vanquish advancing waves of enemies. As invaders increase in count and capability, you'll need all your cunning and expertise to survive. Are you ready to extinguish the dark forces - before they extinguish the precious light?

Illuminate The World


Use diverse tools to illuminate the ground, allowing your towers to find and destroy advancing enemies. Selecting carefully where to light up the world you’re defending can mean the difference between existence and annihilation.

Fight Mysterious Enemies


Enemies are of uncertain origin but are focused on extinguishing the precious light. Many different enemy types with various abilities test your strategy and defenses.

Build Powerful Towers


Ten distinctive towers with multiple levels of upgrades, allow for diverse strategic approaches to taking enemies down. Use illumination towers to light the map so your damage towers can detect and destroy the enemies. Tailor your defense to suit your style of gaming and play your way.

Control The Wisp


Use the Weaponized Intelligent Support Platform (W.I.S.P.), an advanced modular drone, to augment your defenses with an arsenal of powerful abilities. The W.I.S.P. can help double-down the hurt delivered to invaders or turn the tide of a battle that has taken a bad turn.

Customize Defenses With Abilities and Skills


Play the way you want. Spend your resources to upgrade and modify towers using the large skill tree to fit the style you prefer. Develop ten Wisp abilities as you progress. We provide the toolset - not the solution

Dramatic Style & Original Music Score


Immerse yourself in a stark, strange world set in the far distant future where mankind no longer exists as we know it and man and machine are one. An all-original music score bolsters game play as battle intensity increases.

short_description: Hardlight is a stylized, sci-fi tower defense game in which you must defend against dark, enigmatic invaders. Strategize your defense by lighting up the world so that you can detect and destroy waves of enemies.
